p: Julie Power, ‘COVID-19 Has Exposed Australia’s Aged Care Sector’s Flaws, Royal Commission Hears’ (The Age, 10 August 2020). https://www.theage.com.au/national/covid-19-has-exposed-australia-s-aged-care-sector-s-flaws-royal-commission-hears-20200810-p55k7p.html. Accessed 11 August 2020; Jed Montayre and Richard Lindley, ‘Should All Aged-Care Residents with COVID-19 Be Moved to Hospital? Probably, but There Are Drawbacks Too’ (The Conversation, 7 August 2020). https://theconversation.com/should-all-aged-care-residents-with-covid-19-be-moved-to-hospital-probably-but-there-are-drawbacks-too-143826. Accessed 17 August 2020.
